attachments.title: Calvin Harris - Rollin Feat. Future & Khalid
attachments.text: Listen to Calvin Harris' new single 'Rollin' featuring Future & Khalid. Over the past month or so, Calvin Harris has been rolling out new music in support of his upcoming Funk Wav Bounces Vol. 1 mixtape, including &ldquo;Slide&rdquo; with Migos & Frank Ocean and &ldquo;Heatstroke&rdquo; with You...
